window.//url: is the most important entry. The contents of the URL address listed here are brought in as a component.
window.//resizable: When `true`, the window can be resized by the user.
window.//autoShow: Defines the window as visible and not invisible.
window.//top: A pixel value representing the distance from the top edge of the viewport. When set to 'center,' this centers the window.
window.//left: A pixel value representing the distance from the left edge of the viewport. When set to 'center,' this centers the window.
window.//width: sets the default width of the component
window.//height: sets the default height of the component

component.//spawnOnStartup: Controls whether the component automatically spawns during Finsemble's startup.
component.//preload: Defines what scripts are loaded into the window prior to the `url` contents.

Account Detail.//foreign: this subsection provides a place for the component to offer up parameters to other services and components.

dockingService.//canGroup: When `true`, allows the window to form groups with other windows.
